thread.title: Heavily pregnant woman returns to note ‘lazy fat c***’
thread.title_full: Heavily pregnant woman returns to note ‘lazy fat c***’

title: Heavily pregnant woman returns to note ‘lazy fat c***’
text: Share 133 shares 'I went back into the store and the woman on the customer service desk read the note and was as shocked as me. 'I'm left feeling saddened that people in this day and age have such hatred for people they don't understand and how they can described a disabled person as sp*z. 'I would have had some respect if this person would have just asked why I had parked in that spot instead of assuming that I didn't actually need it or wasn't entitled to use it. 'Its left me feeling upset to the point that I don't want to go out on my own.' Ms Patrick posted a note and a photograph of the offensive note on a Multiple Sclerosis Trust Facebook page and received a number of supportive responses Ms Patrick posted a photograph of the offensive note on a Multiple Sclerosis Trust Facebook page and received a number of horrified responses. Most commenters branded the note and the person who wrote it 'disgusting'. One said: 'How utterly vile. I'm in shock reading this.' Ms Patrick said she was 'overwhelmed' at the outpouring of support for her. She said: 'The support from local communities has been amazing. 'I know not everyone thinks like this but it does really knock you when you come across it, which is why I felt it important to make this public because discrimination like this is beyond belief.' Share or comment on this article 133
